ValidationRule.description: If the Reason Lost field is set to Lost Contact with Customer then the "When was contact lost with customer" field is required.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula:
AND( RecordType.Name = 'Opportunity Lightning',
ISPICKVAL(Reason_Lost__c ,"Lost Contact with Customer"),
ISBLANK( TEXT(When_was_contact_lost_with_customer__c)) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: If the Reason Lost field is set to Lost Contact with Customer then the "When was contact lost with customer" field is required.
